trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for WebPartZoneBaseDesigner controls.
trans-unit.target: WebPartZoneBaseDesigner 控制項提供設計階段支援。

trans-unit.source: WebPartZoneBaseDesigner is the base class for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner> and can be inherited to support custom implementations of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> controls.
trans-unit.target: WebPartZoneBaseDesigner 是基底類別<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner>，而且可以支援的自訂實作繼承<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner>

trans-unit.source: WebPartZoneBaseDesigner extends its own base class, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner>, by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method to hide the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: WebPartZoneBaseDesigner 擴充它自己的基底類別， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner>，藉由覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法來隱藏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the main purpose of this class for a control developer is that, unlike its parent, WebPartZoneBaseDesigner has a public constructor so it can be inherited directly and used as a public implementation of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 否則，此類別的控制項開發人員的主要用途是，不同於其父代，WebPartZoneBaseDesigner 具有公用建構函式讓可以直接繼承並做為基底類別的公用實作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the designer bound to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 初始化設計工具繫結至相關聯的執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref>與這個設計工具相關聯的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Hides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle*> property at design time.

The PreFilterProperties method overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to hide the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> property in the designer after calling the parent method.
trans-unit.target: PreFilterProperties 方法會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>隱藏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A>呼叫父方法之後，在設計工具中的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is because the default <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control does not render any zone-level verbs.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為預設<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>控制項不會呈現任何區域層級的動詞。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: If you wish to render zone-level verbs in a derived class, you must override this method to not hide the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要呈現在衍生類別中的區域層級動詞命令，您必須覆寫這個方法，以隱藏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the set of properties associated with the control.
